channel.title: MMO Flappy Birds
channel.description:
Currently a Mopar friend of mine and I are working on a new platform for a Flappy Birds game that will be able to be interacted with multiple users at the same time.
Features:
-Platform will sit on Facebook -Unique user account -Level up system -Advanced ranking methos -Upgrades -Shop -Tournaments -Events
Coded in JS
Updates will be posted here and on Facebook [url=https://www.facebook.com/MMOFlappyBirds]https://www.facebook.com/MMOFlappyBirds[/url]
16/03/2014 V0.1 - Beta Launched (http://flappymmo.no-ip.org:4242/birds) - Sprite system added - Multiplayer fully working - Database structure complete
15/03/2014 V0.0 - Basic physics added - multiplayer function
http://prntscr.com/31dqyl http://prntscr.com/31drab http://prntscr.com/31drgc http://prntscr.com/31drn2

go[/quote]

You can name it flappy birds that are angry. (I’m horrible with making names.)

Honestly though, if you shoot a bird and you have to flap your way to the enemies, that’s be pretty cool.

item.title: MMO Flappy Birds
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

While there are several other Flappy Bird MMOs, I still encourage you to make another. Just try adding a new aspect to the game so it’s not the same as the others. Here are a couple thoughts.

  • Each pole you pass you get one coin that you can spend in a shop.
  • Some of the shop items may include: “Ghost Bird” -> Makes the bird have the invulnerability from the poles/posts for X amount of seconds.
  • Another possible shop item: “Bird Armor” -> Gives the bird a shield of armor that lasts for three “mess ups” or hitting a pole.
  • Highscores system.
  • Other enhancements?

There are plenty of ideas you can play around with, try to make it unique.

Read full topic
